Vision Turbine Flow Meters are Open Distribution - You Can Sell Them, Too!
That's right! Vision turbine flow meters are an open distribution product line from Badger Meter. This means you don't have to be specifically contracted or authorized to sell Vision meters.
Vision turbine flow meters comply with NSF standards for their lead-free design and conform to the requirements of the U.S. Safe Drinking Water Act. The meters are designed for flow measurement of low-viscosity and non-aggressive liquids, including demineralized water, alkaline solutions, fuel consumption, oils, salad oil, beverages, water solutions, and coolants.
The meter is especially suitable for washing machines, dishwashers, coffee machines, laser cooling plants, solar solutions, bakery machines, steam cooking machines in large kitchen plants, and CD or DVD cleaning. Features:
Compact size Measurement in any meter orientation Operating pressure: up to 362.50 psi (25 bar) Temperature range: –4…212° F (–20…100° C) Accuracy: ± 3% Resolution: up to 70,000 ppg (18,500 ppl), depending on model

Meet Jennifer Hersback - Manager of Industrial Inside Technical Sales and Service
Jennifer Hersback has joined the Industrial Sales team as the new Manager of Industrial Inside Technical Sales and Service. Jennifer comes to us from Johnson Controls - Power Solutions Division, where she was the Global Commodity Manager for Lead Acid and Hybrid Chemistry.
Holding a Chemical Engineering Degree and an MBA, Jennifer's prior work experience includes positions in sales management, outside technical service and supply chain management. She is a Six Sigma Black Belt and helped launch a Six Sigma Group for a large chemical corporation.
Jennifer's responsibilities at Badger Meter will include management of both the Racine and Milwaukee Industrial Customer Service and Inside Technical Service groups. Jennifer is married with two children and lives in Lannon, WI.
Recordall® Turbo Series Meters Offering Update
Badger Meter 16 and 20 inch Recordall Turbo Series meters and head assemblies are being discontinued by our supplier. We have a limited number of complete meters available for new orders and a small inventory of head assemblies available to support existing meters in the field. Please check availability with Customer Service prior to accepting orders for this product.
As an alternative to these turbo meters, customers should be transitioned to our M-Series® electromagnetic flow meter offering. When compared to a Turbo meter, the M-Series mag meter provides a more accurate and cost effective solution for applications with large flow requirements.
